page.title: 10Industry Around Newton
page.content: On the B5414 towards the A5 is Redland Tile Company who manufacture and distribute roof tile fittings. Turning left onto the A5 is quarried land belonging to H & T Engineering who sublet part of their land to 3 other small businesses.Caravans are also stored here.Along the A5 is a petrol service station,and continuing down the A5 is Eurotube Ltd. who have warehouse facilities on approx. 18 acres.They are a major stockholder and distributor of piping materials to the petroleum and chemical industries. Adjacent,Miller Buckley Ltd. have a service depot consisting of a workshop and storage of plant hire equipment where they repair civil engineering plant-cranes,diggers,etc. In the centre of the village Newton Forge make wrought iron work-gates between Â£10 & Â£500 & a fire guard about Â£100.
